TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UnauthorizedWebPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart
Public NotInheritable Class UnauthorizedWebPart Inherits ProxyWebPart

summary.span: 當 控制項的 方法對 控制項傳回 時，用來建立預留位置物件。

span.span: Used to create a placeholder object whenever the control's method returns for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件控制項集合提供授權機制，可判斷是否個別可以將控制項加入至頁面。The Web Parts control set provides an authorization mechanism for determining whether individual controls can be added to a page. 開發人員可以選擇性指派到的任意字串屬性控制項。Developers can optionally assign an arbitrary string to the property on a control. 當控制項將控制項加入至網頁，它會檢查此篩選器根據值設定，開發人員所使用的準則方法，並傳回`false`如果控制項未獲授權。When the control is adding controls to a page, it checks this filter value against criteria set by the developer, by using the method, and returns `false` if a control is not authorized. > [!NOTE] > 這個機制也適用於伺服器控制項和使用者控制項放入區域，因為這些控制項以包裝執行階段物件，這個物件會繼承屬性。This mechanism also works with server controls and user controls that are placed in zones, because these controls are wrapped with a object at run time, and this object inherits the property. 當控制項未獲授權，控制插入到未經授權的控制項取代頁面上的控制項樹狀結構的控制項。When a control is not authorized, the control inserts an control into the control tree of the page in place of the unauthorized control. 控制項樹狀結構中的控制項保留在頁面中，未經授權的控制項的位置，並防止使用者可能會有先前套用至任何個人化資料遺失的控制項。An control in the control tree reserves the position of the unauthorized control in the page, and prevents any personalization data that a user might have previously applied to the control from being lost. 控制項永遠不會顯示在頁面上，在其中插入它，或它不會顯示在轉譯頁面的原始程式碼。The control is never displayed on a page in which it is inserted, nor does it appear in the source code for the rendered page. 開發人員可以藉由檢查確認頁面上的控制項樹狀結構中出現屬性控制項。Developers can verify its presence in the page control tree by checking the property of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the control. 程式碼範例的第一個部分是自訂會覆寫控制項方法來建立自訂授權的準則。The first part of the code example is a custom control that overrides the method to create custom authorization criteria. 任何控制項具有其屬性設為特定值或指派給屬性沒有值的任何控制項就會獲得授權，並將不會獲得控制項不符合這些準則。Any control that has its property set to a specific value, or any control that has no value assigned to the property, will be authorized, and controls not meeting these criteria will not be authorized. [!code-csharp[WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview/CS/MyManagerAuthorize.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview/VB/MyManagerAuthorize.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是網頁上裝載自訂控制項。The second part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control. 有三個內宣告的靜態伺服器控制項``項目。There are three static server controls declared within the `` element. 雖然這些控制項不是實際控制項，它們會包裝與物件在執行階段，因此您可以將它們視為控制，並因此將值指派給其屬性。Although these controls are not actually controls, they will be wrapped with a object at run time, so you can treat them as controls and thus assign values to their properties. 請注意，控制項有設定應該啟用授權，根據自訂準則的值為其篩選器控制項。Notice that the control has its filter set to the value that should enable it to be authorized, according to the criteria in the custom control. 控制項具有篩選值，應該會造成它無法進行授權。The control has a filter value that should cause it not to be authorized. 控制項不會指派值給屬性，因此根據預設應該會授權它。The control does not assign a value to the property, so by default it should be authorized. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview/CS/IsAuthorizedCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview/VB/IsAuthorizedVB.aspx#1)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是的設定，您必須在 Web.config 檔案，以啟用匯出 Web 組件描述檔中加入。The third part of the code example is a setting you must add in the Web.config file to enable exporting Web Parts description files. 確定您具有網頁上的相同目錄中的 Web.config 檔案，此程式碼範例。Ensure that you have a Web.config file in the same directory as the Web page for this code example. 內``區段中，請確定沒有``具有項目`enableExport`屬性設為`true`，在下列標記中。Within the `` section, make sure there is a `` element with an `enableExport` attribute set to `true`, as in the following markup. `` `...` `` 載入網頁瀏覽器，並注意和如預期般，呈現控制項，但未授權，因此不會轉譯控制項。Load the page in a browser, and notice that the and controls are rendered as expected, but the control is not rendered because it was not authorized. 按一下**清單 web 組件控制項**按鈕原因控制項清單中的所有控制項的 Id 其集合。Clicking the **List WebPart Controls** button causes the control to list the IDs of all controls in its collection. 請注意，如識別碼列出控制項，證明，控制項已加入至網頁控制項樹狀結構，以保留它的位置，即使標籤不會在頁面的轉譯。Note that the ID for the control is listed, proving that an control was added to the page control tree to hold its place, even though the label is not rendered in the page.

summary.span: 初始化 控制項新執行個體的屬性資料。

span.span: Initializes property data for a new instance of an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式，在這兩個其多載，呼叫基底建構函式在類別。The constructor, in both of its overloads, calls base constructors in the class. 這些建構函式每一個屬性資料初始化，並建立的新執行個體控制項。These constructors each initialize property data and create a new instance of an control. 當控制項已加入控制項 （和其他伺服器或使用者控制項） 至其集合中的控制項，檢查每一個控制項使用方法。When the control is adding controls (and other server or user controls) to its collection of controls, it checks each control using the method. 如果未獲授權的控制執行個體，從控制項 （例如其識別碼） 的特定屬性值指派給屬性中新控制項，而控制項接著會新增至頁面取代失敗的控制項的控制項樹狀架構授權。If a control instance is not authorized, certain property values from the control (such as its ID) are assigned to properties in a new control, and the control is then added to the control tree of the page in place of the control that failed authorization. 永遠不會在頁面中，要呈現控制項，而且使用者無法得知是否有。An control is never rendered in a page, and a user has no way of knowing it is there. 不過，控制項也會充當預留位置，以維護原始控制項的控制項樹狀結構中的位置，以及維護原始控制項任何預先存在的個人化資料。However, an control also acts as a placeholder, maintaining the position of the original control in the control tree, and maintaining any preexisting personalization data for the original control. 這樣一來，如果使用者先前個人化控制項，它就會變成未經授權的某些原因，而且稍後又獲得授權，可還原的使用者個人化資料。That way, if a user previously personalized a control, it then becomes unauthorized for some reason, and later it is authorized again, the user's personalization data can be restored.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 由 控制項授權失敗的 。

span.span: A that has failed to be authorized by the control.

summary.span: 當靜態 控制項 (或伺服器或使用者控制項) 授權失敗時呼叫，初始化 控制項的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of an control, called when a static control (or server or user control) fails authorization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式接受靜態控制項`webPart`做為參數，其中`webPart`授權檢查失敗。The constructor takes a static control `webPart` as a parameter, where `webPart` has failed an authorization check. 靜態控制項是一個宣告中的網頁，而不是以程式設計方式加入標記。A static control is one that is declared in the markup of a Web page, rather than being added programmatically. 建構函式傳回的新執行個體控制項，加入至網頁的控制項樹狀架構取代`webPart`。The constructor returns a new instance of an control, which is added to the page's control tree in place of `webPart`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public UnauthorizedWebPart (string originalID, string originalTypeName, string originalPath, string genericWebPartID);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string originalID, string originalTypeName, string originalPath, string genericWebPartID) cil managed
Public Sub New (originalID As String, originalTypeName As String, originalPath As String, genericWebPartID As String)
public: UnauthorizedWebPart(System::String ^ originalID, System::String ^ originalTypeName, System::String ^ originalPath, System::String ^ genericWebPartID);

param.name: originalID
param.span: 字串，包含已加入至 中，參與 Web 組件應用程式之原始伺服器或使用者控制項的 ID。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the original server or user control that was added to a to participate in a Web Parts application.

param.name: originalTypeName
param.span: 字串，包含原始控制項的型別名稱。

span.span: A string containing the name of the original control's type.

param.name: originalPath
param.span: 字串，包含使用者控制項的相對虛擬路徑，如果原始控制項是使用者控制項。

span.span: A string containing the relative virtual path to the user control, if the original control is a user control.

param.name: genericWebPartID
param.span: 字串，包含用來包裝原始伺服器或使用者控制項之 控制項的 ID。

span.span: A string containing the ID of the control that wraps the original server or user control.

summary.span: 當動態 控制項 (或伺服器或使用者控制項) 授權失敗時呼叫，初始化 控制項的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of an control, called when a dynamic control (or server or user control) fails authorization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式呼叫時動態或其他伺服器控制項失敗其授權檢查。The constructor is called when a dynamic or other server control fails its authorization check. 動態控制項是以程式設計的方式，加入至頁面，或由使用者從類別目錄 Web 組件的控制項。A dynamic control is one that is added to a page programmatically, or by a user from a catalog of Web Parts controls. 建構函式傳回的新執行個體控制項取代動態控制項授權失敗。The constructor returns a new instance of an control to replace the dynamic control that failed authorization. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .
